name: Urban Limo of Legend City 2018
description:
Watch out for this free limousine 3D driver simulator. You can pick up beautiful looking famous passengers in the realistic city and bring them to their destination in this limousine parking game. Park the limo in the perfect spot after you drove them through the city in this driver simulator. Show top skills here.
In this car parking mania, you should reach destination on time and pickup tourist otherwise your level failed. First level easy but next levels will be more challenging and addictive. This car parking transport and driving skills will test you extreme driving and parking skills. Multilevel make game more adventure. This game will help you have experience of becoming an taxi driver. This game is enjoyable as it provides the best 3d driving experience.
Are you playing this new amazing and adventurous 3D exciting limousine car simulator game for you. It is an top limousine car games show your limo parking skills. Feel the top flexibility as compared to the other limo drifting and parking or racing games. Start to pick up some city passengers in your luxury limousine and take them towards their destination. Just follow the arrows on the city road. In this Limo car city driving simulator game your mission is pick up the passenger from one place and drop the passengers to the other place and complete your task.
Features:
- Limousine are biggest car and require superior skills
-Pick and drop services to the passengers duty
-Improving your driving and parking skills
